attributes.action: Excerise the public's right to Inciate a call for a new government on 6th May 17
attributes.additional_details: There are Strikes everywhere. Ian Duncan Smith resignation is the most important act of them all. There are now calls for a general strike on the 4th July 2016. The current budget says it all! Mr Gove had a vote of No Confidence by Head Teachers! Ian Duncan Smith say's your a step to far! Schools are now being privatsed. This goverment is biggest cause of all our problems. You don't listen to the people, the current mood in our streets is dissapointment and depression, we want you out! #GE17
attributes.background: We voted in a government of just 37% majority. We asked them to do a job... They have not. In 6 years they have picked apart at the most vunanable whilst lining their very rich pockets. They have privatised NHS, Schools and the PostOffice, sold off land to overseas investments. This has to stop!

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament. You could start a petition calling for a General Election to be held on 6 May 2017.
